name: Overdrive
description: You create a deafening, explosive sound that damages all creatures within 20 feet of you. Force any creature in range to make a CON save against your Move DC, taking 2d12 + MOVE electric damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
